body:
This package was pointing at github instead of pypi, and none of the hashes are correct (they don't match github releases or pypi releases), I'm not sure how that happened.

Changed to pypi, updated hashes, and added newest version.

For reference, github has these md5sums:
```
cac074932278e92f5256d53eb1cd40de  2.5-final.tar.gz
f5144120a1f42061ae1555521fab73e7  2.5.1-final.tar.gz
6979f1a09b4af0a31cded71a038375d0  2.5.2-final.tar.gz
6794ce15ce838b9034137db8b0231201  2.6-final.tar.gz
69f1b6ce0cf7366eef5cee0914fc5be5  2.6.1-final.tar.gz
b79ea3101580569efd31655ca9fcbd30  2.6.2-final.tar.gz
678eba49a361a6bd74cb316ffdff96d5  2.6.3-final.tar.gz
1c4632efd29a7a2969554383a962f6ff  2.6.4-final.tar.gz
47a71391460a0417b9f2e24baffdc0df  2.6.5-final.tar.gz
2c8a210e4cd5c99c18be1afb4825eabc  2.6.6-final.tar.gz
ecf2892147ba0af686bb552db328b239  2.6.7-final.tar.gz
```

And pypi has these:
```
37d4ef8512c595ea5c2ce70ce3a6c2ea  Markdown-2.5.tar.gz
9effb2679302efb1ce14265cb9e46f96  Markdown-2.5.1.tar.gz
db9e3175f4638bfd1574996bf471ea96  Markdown-2.5.2.tar.gz
8667532c78fc3b411be979447ea21be2  Markdown-2.6.tar.gz
c084f9d2fd0a839639fd9aa8c442d5cd  Markdown-2.6.1.tar.gz
256d19afcc564dc4ce4c229bb762f7ae  Markdown-2.6.2.tar.gz
4a05b6da0908ebda635eb29c56e8a581  Markdown-2.6.3.tar.gz
4e8b4d22af82e0d92811938fb283be90  Markdown-2.6.4.tar.gz
4fdb39248c9919e32ab68f5e5a9fa9f2  Markdown-2.6.5.tar.gz
d6737edcdb9a9aceaef0bf28455673be  Markdown-2.6.6.tar.gz
a06f1c5d462b32e0e8da014e9eebb0d9  Markdown-2.6.7.tar.gz
```
title: py-markdown: fix url and hashes
